title: This sums up my exact feelings of "Dadbod", aka girls wanting overweight guys
body:
This literally is my exact thoughts:

"What is Dadbod?" This:
http://images1.tickld.com/live/712406.jpg

It's not about physical appearance or bodytypes, 
it's about a woman dominating a man.
It's easy, it's all about them and they tell them exactly what they want to hear.
It's the same as being physically attracted to the physical embodiment of complacency.
